sentences.sContent: His wife divorced him for failing to consummate their marriage.
sentences.sCn: 他的妻子因为他未能完婚而跟他离婚了。

remMethod.val: con + sum (总数) + mate → 总数的， 全数的 → 圆满的

words.tran: 保护消费者利益运动；用户至上主义
圆满成功；完成；成就；达到极点

trans.tranOther: to make a marriage or relationship complete by having sex
